languages.text: "Предвосхищая все вопросы, Ваша Светлость... Нет. Я абсолютно точно уверен, что Лорд-капитан жив, так просто его не сломить — ни тело, ни дух. К тому же с ним Серый Вортен, он душу продаст, но Лорд-капитана убережет от любых бед".

traits.locale_text: "Предвосхищая все вопросы, Ваша Светлость... Нет. Я абсолютно точно уверен, что Лорд-капитан жив, так просто его не сломить — ни тело, ни дух. К тому же с ним Серый Вортен, он душу продаст, но Лорд-капитана убережет от любых бед".
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Anticipating the next question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... No. I am confident the Lord Captain is still alive, his body and spirit do not break easily. And besides, he is accompanied by Worten the Grey who would sell his soul if that helped to keep the Lord Captain out of harm's way."

traits.locale_text: "Anticipating the next question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... No. I am confident the Lord Captain is still alive, his body and spirit do not break easily. And besides, he is accompanied by Worten the Grey who would sell his soul if that helped to keep the Lord Captain out of harm's way."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: « Mais pour anticiper votre prochaine question, Votre Seigneurie... Non, je reste convaincu que le seigneur-capitaine est toujours en vie ; son corps et son esprit sont faits du plus solide des métaux. De plus, il est accompagné par Worten le Gris, un saint qui vendrait son âme sans la moindre hésitation pour sauver celle du seigneur-capitaine. »
languages.original_text: "Anticipating the next question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... No. I am confident the Lord Captain is still alive, his body and spirit do not break easily. And besides, he is accompanied by Worten the Grey who would sell his soul if that helped to keep the Lord Captain out of harm's way."

traits.locale_text: « Mais pour anticiper votre prochaine question, Votre Seigneurie... Non, je reste convaincu que le seigneur-capitaine est toujours en vie ; son corps et son esprit sont faits du plus solide des métaux. De plus, il est accompagné par Worten le Gris, un saint qui vendrait son âme sans la moindre hésitation pour sauver celle du seigneur-capitaine. »
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “关于您接下来的问题，大人……不，我很确信，舰长大人还活着，毕竟他的身体与精神不会轻易崩溃。况且，他身边还有灰斑沃尔腾。沃尔腾为了保护舰长大人，甚至愿意出卖自己的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "Anticipating the next question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... No. I am confident the Lord Captain is still alive, his body and spirit do not break easily. And besides, he is accompanied by Worten the Grey who would sell his soul if that helped to keep the Lord Captain out of harm's way."

traits.locale_text: “关于您接下来的问题，大人……不，我很确信，舰长大人还活着，毕竟他的身体与精神不会轻易崩溃。况且，他身边还有灰斑沃尔腾。沃尔腾为了保护舰长大人，甚至愿意出卖自己的灵魂。”
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Um die nächste Frage vorwegzunehmen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Nein. Ich bin überzeugt, dass der Lord Captain noch lebt. Sein Körper und sein Geist sind nicht so leicht zu brechen. Und zudem begleitet ihn Worten der Graue, der seine Seele verkaufen würde, wenn er den Lord Captain dadurch vor Schaden bewahren könnte."
languages.original_text: "Anticipating the next question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... No. I am confident the Lord Captain is still alive, his body and spirit do not break easily. And besides, he is accompanied by Worten the Grey who would sell his soul if that helped to keep the Lord Captain out of harm's way."

traits.locale_text: "Um die nächste Frage vorwegzunehmen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Nein. Ich bin überzeugt, dass der Lord Captain noch lebt. Sein Körper und sein Geist sind nicht so leicht zu brechen. Und zudem begleitet ihn Worten der Graue, der seine Seele verkaufen würde, wenn er den Lord Captain dadurch vor Schaden bewahren könnte."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «Antes de que pregunte, {mf|milord|milady}... No. Estoy seguro de que el Lord Capitán está vivo, pues confío en la fortaleza de su cuerpo y espíritu. Además, va acompañado de Worten el Gris, quien vendería su alma por defender al Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "Anticipating the next question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... No. I am confident the Lord Captain is still alive, his body and spirit do not break easily. And besides, he is accompanied by Worten the Grey who would sell his soul if that helped to keep the Lord Captain out of harm's way."

traits.locale_text: «Antes de que pregunte, {mf|milord|milady}... No. Estoy seguro de que el Lord Capitán está vivo, pues confío en la fortaleza de su cuerpo y espíritu. Además, va acompañado de Worten el Gris, quien vendería su alma por defender al Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「次の質問だが、陛下…いや。私はロード・キャプテンは、まだ生きていると確信している。彼の体と精神は簡単には壊れない。それに、彼はヴォルテン・ザ・グレイと一緒だ。彼は自分の魂を投げうってでも、ロード・キャプテンを危険から守る」
languages.original_text: "Anticipating the next question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... No. I am confident the Lord Captain is still alive, his body and spirit do not break easily. And besides, he is accompanied by Worten the Grey who would sell his soul if that helped to keep the Lord Captain out of harm's way."

traits.locale_text: 「次の質問だが、陛下…いや。私はロード・キャプテンは、まだ生きていると確信している。彼の体と精神は簡単には壊れない。それに、彼はヴォルテン・ザ・グレイと一緒だ。彼は自分の魂を投げうってでも、ロード・キャプテンを危険から守る」
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Siz sormadan söyleyeyim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Hayır. Lord Kaptan'ın hayatta olduğundan eminim. Ruhu ve bedeni öyle kolay zedelenmez. Ayrıca yanında Gri Worten de var. Lord Kaptan'ı korumak için canını bile verir o."
languages.original_text: "Anticipating the next question, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... No. I am confident the Lord Captain is still alive, his body and spirit do not break easily. And besides, he is accompanied by Worten the Grey who would sell his soul if that helped to keep the Lord Captain out of harm's way."
